name: src/frame.mjs
delay
description: The delay of this frame.

name: dataURL
description: The data URL of the sprite in this frame.

name: index
description: The index of this frame. This indicates the order of the frame. 0 - Infinity.

name: parent
description: The icon that owns this frame.

name: defaultDelay
description: The default delay in ms of frames.

name: constructor
description: Create this frame class instance.

params.name: pFrameData
params.description: The frame data that is used to build this frame.

params.name: pParentIcon
params.description: The icon that created this frame.

name: parse
description: parses through the icon data and adds data to this frame.

params.name: pFrameData
params.description: The frame data that is used to build this frame.

name: setDelay
description: Sets the delay of this frame in ms.

params.name: pDelay
params.description: The delay in ms to set this frame to.

name: getDelay
description: Gets the delay of this frame.

name: setDataURL
description: Sets the data url of this frame.

params.name: pDataURL
params.description: The base64 data of this image.

name: getDataURL
description: Gets the data URL of this frame.

unknown.tagValue: {DataURL} - The base64 data of this image.

return.description: The base64 data of this image.

name: export
description: Exports this frame's data into proper vyi format.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array of data related to this frame in the proper vyi format.

return.description: An array of data related to this frame in the proper vyi format.

name: src/icon.mjs
states
description: An array of Icon's that are state of this icon.

name: frames
description: An arary of Frame's that are the frames of this icon.

name: width
description: The width of this icon. All states and frames of this icon must match this size.

name: height
description: The height of this icon. All states and frames of this icon must match this size.

name: dataURL
description: The data URL of the sprite in this frame.

name: delay
description: The delay of this frame.

name: name
description: The name of this icon.

name: constructor
description: Creates this icon instance.

params.name: pIconData
params.description: The icon data that is used to build this icon.

name: parse
description: parses through the icon data and adds data to this icon.

params.name: pIconData
params.description: The icon data that is used to build this icon.

name: setSize
description: Sets the size of this icon.

params.name: pWidth
params.description: The width of this icon.

params.name: pHeight
params.description: THe height of this icon.

name: getSize
description: Gets the width and height of this icon and returns it.

unknown.tagValue: {Object} An object with the width and height of this icon.

return.description: An object with the width and height of this icon.

name: setDataURL
description: Sets the data url of this icon.

params.name: pDataURL
params.description: The base64 data of this image.

name: getDataURL
description: Gets the data URL of this icon.

unknown.tagValue: {DataURL} - The base64 data of this image.

return.description: The base64 data of this image.

name: setDelay
description: Sets the frame delay of this icon.

params.name: pDelay
params.description: The delay to set this frame to.

name: getDelay
description: Gets the delay of this icon.

name: rename
description: Changes the name of this icon.

params.name: pName
params.description: The new name of the icon.

name: getName
description: Returns the name of this icon.

name: setAllFrameDelays
description: Sets all the frames belonging to this icon to the same delay.

params.name: pDelay
params.description: The delay to set all frames to.

name: addState
description: Adds this icon data as a state. A state is also an icon.

unknown.tagValue: {Icon|undefined} The state that was added or undefined.

params.name: pIconData
params.description: The data used to create this state icon.

return.description: The state that was added or undefined.

name: removeState
description: Removes the state passed or the state with the name pName.

params.name: pState
params.description: The state to remove from this icon. pName should be not be used in tandem with this method of removing.

params.name: pName
params.description: The name of the state to remove. pState must be undefined to use this method for removing.

name: addFrame
description: Adds a new frame to this icon.

unknown.tagValue: {Frame|undefined} The frame that was added or undefined.

params.name: pFrameData
params.description: The frame data to give this frame.

return.description: The frame that was added or undefined.

name: removeFrame
description: Removes the frame passed or the frame that exists at pIndex.

params.name: pFrame
params.description: The frame to remove from this icon. pIndex should be not be used in tandem with this method of removing.

params.name: pIndex
params.description: The index of the frame to remove. pFrame must be undefined to use this method for removing.

name: indexFrames
description: Index the frames properly.

name: reorderFrame
description:
Reorders the frame in the animation. The index of the passed frame will be swapped with the frame at pIndex.
The "first" frame of the animation is technically this icon's dataURL. So if you are aiming to change the order of this icon and convert it into a frame.
pCurrentIndex must be set to -1 to match this icon.

params.name: pCurrentIndex
params.description: The current index of the frame.

params.name: pIndex
params.description: The index the frame will be moving to.

name: getFrame
description:
Gets the frame existing at pIndex.
Frame 0 will actually be frame "1" in the animation. As this icon will actually be frame 0.
If you are trying to get "frame" 1. Then you will need to use the icon's delay and data url. As that is frame 0.

params.name: pIndex
params.description: The index of the frame to get.

name: getFrames
description: Returns an array of all the frames this icons has.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array of frames this icon has.

return.description: An array of frames this icon has.

name: getFramesData
description: Gets all the frames belonging to this icon.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array containing the frame data of all frames.

return.description: An array containing the frame data of all frames.

name: getState
description: Gets the state that has the name pName.

unknown.tagValue: {Icon} The state that has the name of pName.

params.name: pName
params.description: The name of the state to get.

return.description: The state that has the name of pName.

name: getStates
description: Returns an array of all the states this icons has.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array of states this icon has.

return.description: An array of states this icon has.

name: getStatesData
description: Gets all the states belonging to this icon.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array containing the state data of all frames.

return.description: An array containing the state data of all frames.

name: exportAsState
description: Exports this icon as if it was a state in the proper vyi format.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array of data related to this icon as if it were a state.

return.description: An array of data related to this icon as if it were a state.

name: export
description: Exports this icon's data into proper vyi format.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array of data related to this icon in the proper vyi format.

return.description: An array of data related to this icon in the proper vyi format.

name: src/vyi.mjs
version
description: The version of the module.

name: logger
description: The logger module this module uses to log errors / logs.

name: icons
description: An array of icons that belong to this VYI

name: name
description: The name of this vyi.

name: formatVersion
description: The version of the VYI.

name: constructor
description: Initializes this module with the information from the VYI passed.

params.name: pVYIData
params.description: A JSON / Javascript object containing the vyi information.

name: parse
description:
Initializes this module with the information from the VYI passed.
Can call parse multiple times with different data to "merge" vyis.

params.name: pVYIData
params.description: A string containing the path to the vyi json or a JSON / Javascript object containing the vyi information.

name: addIcon
description: Adds an icon to this VYI.

params.name: pIconData
params.description: The icon data to use.

name: removeIcon
description: Removes the icon passed or the icon with the name pName.

params.name: pIcon
params.description: The state to remove from this icon. pName should be not be used in tandem with this method of removing.

params.name: pName
params.description: The name of the icon to remove. pIcon must be undefined to use this method for removing.

name: getIconNames
description: Returns all the icon names in this vyi.

unknown.tagValue: {Array} An array of icon names in this vyi.

return.description: An array of icon names in this vyi.

name: getIcon
description: Gets the icon that has the name pName.

unknown.tagValue: {Icon|undefined} The icon that has the name pName or undefined.

params.name: pName
params.description: The name of the icon to get.

return.description: The icon that has the name pName or undefined.

name: export
description: Exports this VYI into VYI format.

content:
# VYI Module
A lightweight module to read / manage .vyi files created in the Vylocity Game Engine.

## Installation

### ES Module

```js
import { VYI } from './vyi.mjs';
```

### IIFE (Immediately Invoked Function Expression)

```js
<script src="vyi.js"></script>;
// ...
window.VyiBundle.VYI;
```

### CommonJS (CJS) Module

```js
const { VYI } = require('./vyi.cjs.js');
```

### Global Dependency

VYI relies on the `VYLO` variable being globally accessible.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "vyi",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "A lightweight module to read / manage .vyi files created in the Vylocity Game Engine.",
  "main": "src/vyi.mjs",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "build:rollup": "npx rollup -c",
    "build:docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json",
    "build:dist": "npm run build:rollup && npm run build:docs"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "https://github.com/doubleactii",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/EvitcaStudio/vyi"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@rollup/plugin-babel": "^6.0.4",
    "@rollup/plugin-terser": "^0.4.4",
    "rollup": "^4.14.1",
    "rollup-plugin-banner2": "^1.2.3",
    "rollup-plugin-cleandir": "^2.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-replace": "^2.2.0"
  }
}
